modName: The Joy of Perspective conversion tools
summary: The Joy of Perspective conversion tools is a software that help you to bring to your custom models the true first person from the joy of perspective without stress :-)
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][color=red]What is it ?[/color][/u][/b]
This is a software that help you to convert your custom model in order to make them [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6002]The joy of Perspective[/url] compatible

[b][u]How does it work ?[/u][/b]
It follow the instruction given in the "Custom armors and body replacer mods" section for you. In 2 minutes all is done :-)

[b][u][color=red]How to use it ?[/color][/u][/b]
[list][*] Download the portable and standalone executable from the download tab.[*] Run it, it will ask you if you want to use the default meshes folder of your game or if you want to specify the folder to use[*] It will scan your 1stXXX.nif files and propose you a file to replace it however the choice is yours. (Many times you will just hit enter)[*] At the end of the installation you will be prompt if you want to create a reinstaller and/or an uninstaller the first will store the choices you made before and the second the files that were replaced[*] If you have not generated the uninstaller you will have .nif.old files in your meshes folder and just run again the software to restore them.[/list]

[b][u]Can I share my awesome reinstaller ?[/u][/b]
Yes you can however reinstaller [b]does not store any[/b] file it just store instructions so if your friend do not have one of the files you used, it will be ignored with a warning message

[b][u]Can I merge two generated reinstaller ?[/u][/b]
Yes you can yet this functionality is not completely tested, just drag and drop an installer on another

[b][u]Can I merge two generated uninstaller ?[/u][/b]
No you can't, maybe in the future.

[b][u][color=red]Is it reversible ?[/color][/u][/b]
Yes it is, it's easy to uninstall (just run the file and ask to uninstall when prompted)

[b][u]I'm a programmer and I want the source code can I have it ?[/u][/b]
Yes, the source code will be in the download tab, the language I used was [url=http://www.autoitscript.com/site/autoit/]Autoit v3[/url]

[b][u]Some notes...[/u][/b]
[list][*] This file does not use any file from the mod "The Joy of Perspective" [*] I was unable to contact the RFPV team to ask their benediction (I tried) but I think I do not need a permission because of the previous point. [*] English is not my language and because of that I do not mastered it when I was five like you so be patient with me :-)[*] This is an early beta and must be considered as this. the main function (installing/uninstalling) is safe but when you try installer merging, uninstaller generation, ... I suggest you to backup you file before, If you do not and something bad happen, it's your fault not mine.[/list]
